title: PMS 2.0 282 - TNF Preview, Darius Butler, Alan Faneca, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys chat about his exploits last night on NXT and the new stable that he is forming, plus they look ahead to tonight's Thursday Night Football game between the Falcons vs Panthers, and make a couple of picks. Also joining the show is 9 Year NFL vet at DB, co-host of the Man-To-Man Pod, Everything DB, and friend of the program, Darius Butler. Pat and Darius chat about tonight's Thursday Night game, a clip from the Man-To-Man Pod where Darius states that there aren't really any athletes on Special Teams, Darius gives a few betting locks for tonight's game including QB passing yard over/under's, if he thinks Gilly Lock will end up getting dealt by the Patriots, and how DB is a huge Dodgers fan (27:19-48:54). Next, Super Bowl Champion, 9x Pro Bowler, 8x All-Pro, member of the NFL 2000's and Pittsburgh Steelers All-Decade Team's, Alan Faneca joins the program. Pat and Alan chat about his drastic weight change after retiring, and what he's done in order to keep that weight off, what Ravens week is like preparation wise for a Steelers player, his thoughts on the Steelers offensive line this year, and how he's seen offensive line play change since he retired (51:48-1:05:52). Lastly, Pat and the boys welcome in AJ Hawk for another edition of McAfee & Hawk Sports Talk. Pat and AJ discuss tonight's Thursday Night Game and whether tropical storm Zeta will throw any kinks into the game, and everything else going on in the NFL (1:05:54-1:31:40). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow, and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
